EmailTemplate.name: Breakfast and Lunch series-DC reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Friendly reminder-ASA Interactive Feedback Session
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s just around the corner! American Student Assistance’s Interactive Feedback Session
We look forward to seeing you for lunch at an interactive feedback session on October 17 from 12 – 2 p.m. at the Hyatt Regency in Crystal City, Washington, DC.
If you have questions about this event or need more information, please contact Lynne Cao at lcao@amsa.com.
